name: Cappadocia
teaser: Where fairy chimneys touch the clouds
shortStory: Millions of years of volcanic eruptions and erosion carved this surreal landscape. Ancient civilizations carved entire cities into the soft rock, while today hot air balloons drift through dawn skies over this otherworldly terrain.
bullets: Fairy chimneys formed over millions of years
Hot air balloon capital of the world
Early Christians carved hidden churches here

media.alt: Hot air balloons over Cappadocia at sunrise
